comment: it is online and everything was due at the end of the year. take this course there's no way to fail I waited till 3 days till everything was due and made an A+. Trust me and take this class.
He is very nice and responds well to emails. I did not learn a whole lot but the class was very easy and required a maximum of 10 minutes of my time per week.

It's his first semester. He got assigned the day before classes started. Read the slides during class and talked about what he experienced on the job. Good experience in the field. Wouldn't take him if you want to learn. Easy A. Ends class early every time. Book was helpful as you could find everything in it. Graded everything last week of class
